meanings.definition: A disease caused by a fungus of the genus Sporothrix, typically affecting the skin.
meanings.sent1: Sporotrichoses can lead to skin infections.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to treat sporotrichoses effectively.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was so contagious, it spread like sporotrichoses among the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness bloomed like sporotrichoses, touching everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The image of sporotrichoses crawling on the skin is unsettling.
